mapper.select: SELECT eupmyeon.eupmyeon_code as eupmyeonCode , sido.sido_name as sidoName , sigungu.sigungu_name as sigunguName , eupmyeon.eupmyeon_name as eupmyeonName FROM sido , sigungu , eupmyeon WHERE sido.sido_code = #{sidoCode} = sigungu.sido_code = #{sidoCode} AND sigungu.sigungu_code = #{sigunguCode} = eupmyeon.sigungu_code = #{sigunguCode}
